title: Strengthening System Design Competencies: VR-Based English Listening Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend intermediate-level English pronunciation used in everyday situations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can participate in simple conversations with native speakers in VR environments and identify core information with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can improve their pre-assessment scores by 20% on TOEIC Listening Part 1–3 question types.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
